attributes.action: Get Captain Tom Moore Honoured by the Queen
attributes.additional_details: Because he’s an incredible inspirational example of a man and deserves to be shown what a credit he is to the world! This dear man has raised over 15 million pounds for the nhs during this difficult time being honoured is the least me can owe him and show our appreciation. What a legend.
attributes.background: I think Captain Tom who raises over 15 Million for the nhs in the covid-19 pandemic should be honoured by the Queen

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
